Sentece: Prior treatment with 400 mg/kg metyrapone tartrate decreased total clearance of acetaminophen over 30% in the linear range (25.4 +/- 2.0 vs. 36.2 +/- 3.7 ml/min/kg in controls; p less than 0.01) and over 40% in the nonlinear range of disposition (4.42 +/- 1.07 vs 7.76 +/- 1.37 ml/min/kg in controls, p less than 0.01).
Title: Suppression of acetaminophen conjugation and of conjugate elimination in the rat by metyrapone, a classical P-450 inhibitor.
